Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response:
Well genAI feedback is available anytime I need it which is convenient. On the other hand, teachers are real people and can't give me immediate feedback whenever i need it.
However, teachers give me better feedback because they have context to your work while you have to explain the context to the genAI and sometimes it gets it wrong.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: idk how i feel really isn't that important when it comes to feedback

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: genAI might give me more (but less helpful) feedback while a teacher will give me less but more helpful (most of the time) feedback.
